message.content: cs.IR, cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.DL. The paper focuses on improving the term weighting model for question retrieval in Q&A communities, which is a common problem in information retrieval (IR) and natural language processing (NLP). Therefore, cs.IR (Information Retrieval) and cs.CL (Computation and Language) are the most likely sub-categories. The paper also proposes a question retrieval method based on convolutional neural networks, which falls under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence), cs.LG (Learning) and cs.DL (Deep Learning).
